room-deluxe-201.description: Spanning 60 sqm, the Deluxe Room offers a private haven with stylish features and furnishings, including a choice of king-size or double-size beds with Sealy mattresses, a spacious bathroom with bathtub, rain shower, and designer amenities.

amenities: Coffee and Tea-making Facilities with Nespresso Machine
room-family-401.description: The Grand Deluxe Twin at Okada Manila offers a luxurious retreat with two double-sized beds in a spacious 75 to 95 sqm setting. Unwind in style with a soothing jet tub, take in captivating views of the Manila Bay or The Fountain, and relax with premium amenities like Roberto Cavalli bathroom products and a walk-in closet. With an in-room tablet for easy service and entertainment, this room is designed for a cozy and stylish stay.

amenities: Coffee and Tea-making Facilities with Nespresso Machine
room-standard-102.description: Intricately designed to suit your taste, our Junior Suite promises a truly remarkable stay. Spanning 100 to 150 sqm of opulence, this suite features a comfortable living space complemented by an ergonomic study area. The king-size bed with a Sealy mattress ensures restful nights, while the private bathroom, equipped with a rain shower and designer amenities, offers a luxurious retreat. The suite also includes a mini bar stocked with the finest selections and a Nespresso machine, allowing you to enjoy your favorite coffee whenever you desire.

amenities: Coffee and Tea-making Facilities with Nespresso Machine
room-suite-301.description: Bask in the comfort of our Executive Suite, where sheer sophistication complements the captivating Manila skyline. Spanning 200 to 250 sqm, the suite features well-appointed living and dining areas and a bar stocked with only the finest selections, including a Nespresso machine for your coffee cravings. It includes a king-size bed or double beds with Sealy mattresses, a bathtub, rain shower, and designer amenitiescreating a truly remarkable experience.
